original_title: Sailor and the Seven Ballz 2: Return of the Ballz
overview: The heroes and heroines of the infamous Sailor and the Seven Ballz are back for an all-new sexcapade with even more of your favorite anime characters. Filled with intergalactic lust, S&M battles, tentacle terror and hardcore action, power up to a debauched and depraved level that's definitely not for the easily offended!
title: Sailor and the Seven Ballz 2: Return of the Ballz
